professionalSummary: Software Engineer with experience in web development and cybersecurity. Good at building and maintaining websites with React and Node.js. Worked on making web apps faster and more secure. Enjoy working with teams and learning new skills.

description: Built and developed web applications using React and Angular.   Worked with designers and other developers to add new features and improve user experience. Improved website performance by reducing load times and optimizing resources.
Optimized web performance by improving load speed and reducing code size. Tested and fixed bugs to ensure a better user experience.

education.description: Studied cybersecurity principles, network security, and web application protection. Gained skills in encryption, ethical hacking, and secure coding practices.

education.degree: Master of Science in Software Engineering
education.description: Specialized in software development methodologies, advanced programming techniques, and project management.
